metadata.title: The Prestigious Classic Lit Club's Activities

tracks.text: A lion dog statue stands in sunlight pouring between cedars.
Red banners with white text stand in a row.
A scooter drives by a shrine, with stone work and banners.
A suburban house sits across the street.
A clock reads 6:59, Friday, May 18, 20.7 Celsius.
A hand reaches up and feels around the top of the clock.
The hand drops, limply. Handwritten text appears over scenes of Hotaro getting ready.
Intro.
End of intro. Baseball players run in a line.
Hotaro sits across from Chitanda. She pushes a bowl full of packaged treats.
He unwraps a brown and yellow candy wrapper. The clock shows half past 4.
3 wrappers sit on the table.
Chitanda turns a page in a book.
Hotaro reads and drinks from a tea cup.
He looks down.
She leans over him. He averts his eyes and blushes.
He turns away from her.
He frowns. She opens a boxes. He looks at books on shelves.
She opens a cupboard.
9 til 5
She drags him by the arm out of the room and down the hallway.
Library
Mayaka sits behind the library desk.
A blue book with gold trim on the cover. Kamiyama High School's 50 Year Progress. There are photos and details from 1972 and 3.
5 girl names from 2D, E, and F
Hotaro looks away. Chitanda puts the book in front of his face.
Other students stare.
Rikka, Dawn of Summer, When we hail the rise of summer.
The return box is a small tray with a pile of books.
Hotaro tugs on his bangs.
In a fantasy sequence, Hotaro sits at a long table. Candles light. Chitanda, a maid, presents a menu.
Gray Course or Rosy Course. Rosy includes Saute of Bother and Toil, Provencal Roast of Curiosity, Mille-feuille of Reality & Fatigue.
Gray includes Evasion appetizer, Idelness & Indolence Terrine, Stewed Deference, Rejection & Peace-of-Mind Tiramisu.
Hotaro reaches towards the Gray course.
Chitanda grabs his fist and drags it to the Rosy course.
His hand lands on Rosy.
Satoshi Fukube sits sadly behind the library desk. Hotaro and the girls walk down the hall.
The librarian, Yoko Itoigawa, walks away.
Hotaro's house. 10:35, Sunday, May 20.
A western style cozy coffee shop called Pineapple Sand. The exterior has plants in dozens of different sized planters. Inside, several clocks read 1:27.
Hotaro wears a white crew neck T shirt, with an unbuttoned collared shirt over top. He drinks coffee.'
Chitanda walks in, wearing a white sun dress and a pink cardigan. Her hair is up in a pony tail, and she carries a pink bag.
Clown tchotchkes sit on a shelf. Chitanda mixes whipped cream in a full coffee cup. Hotaro's sits empty.
Chitanda looks down. Hotaro stares, arms folded.
She looks to the side. Hotaro gapes. Text appears, The niece of time.
